_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Multipaper Master
author: support@pterodactyl.io

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Vanilla MC Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

DOWNLOAD_URL="https://api.multipaper.io/v2/projects/multipaper/versions/1.20.1/builds/57/downloads/multipaper-master-${MASTER_VERSION}-all.jar"

echo -e "running: curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL"
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} $DOWNLOAD_URL

echo -e "Install Complete"

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description: The name of the server jarfile to run the server with.

variables.name: Server Version
variables.description: The version of Multipaper Master. Go to Settings > Reinstall Server to apply.
